Reviews.Title: Great wireless kit!
Reviews.Author: Kenny L.
Reviews.Content: everything i needed came in the box, all the cameras and power supplies etc.  very easy to set up and the video quality was amazing!

Reviews.Title: Interfers with Wireless Internet
Reviews.Author: Centreport RV
Reviews.Content: This product was the least expensive option with a high customer rating, which is why we purchased it.  For the money, it is a good product.  However, the frequency interferes with our current wireless signal so we have not been able to use it.  We do expect to be able to work out the problems though.

Reviews.Title: OK 4 THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: CHRIS BARRY
Reviews.Content: IT'S A DECENT CAMERA SYSTEM FOR STARTERS AND MY OPINION IS ITS NOT WORTH NO MORE THAN $150..NOT GOOD FOR SERCURITY JUST FOR MONITERING.HAD IT FOR A MONTH B 4 2 OUT OF THE 4 CAMERAS STARTED GETTING STATIC CONSTANTLY.IT HAS REAL CRAPPY NIGHT VISION..MY OPINION WOULD BE TO SAVE UP AN EXTRA $100 AND GET A BETTER CAMERA SYSTEM AND BE DONE WITH IT CAUSE IF U BUY IT TRUST ME YUR GONNA WANT TO UPPGRADE....IF U JUST WANNA BE ABLE TO SCARE PEOPLE FROM STEALING OR WATCH YUR KIDS PLAY OUT SIDE OR EVEN PETS OR COMPANY IN ANOTHER ROOM IT'S PERFECT.....FOR AN EXTRA $100 BUCKS YOU CAN BUY A WIRED SYSTEM WITCH IS BETTER WITH A DVR AND CAN WATCH YUR HOME FROM COMPUTER,LAPTOP OR SMART PHONE...

Reviews.Title: Pinecom LYD W801J4 4 Wireless DayNight Camera R530A Receiver Set
Reviews.Author: Adam M.
Reviews.Content: Good set for the money, does get interference from wireless internet though.  4-way setting will allow a tv to cycle through all the cameras at a decent pace.  Picture is good.

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Christine Baublitz "Elisa Christine Baublitz"
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately I purchased these cameras in 2011 but never opened or used them until now and what a mistake!!! I should have opened them sooner and tried them out, I could have sent them back. I was only able to get one camera working (not all that well but at least I could see the picture)all of the other cameras were nothing but static no matter what we did to try and fix it. Waste of money and time.

ProductInfo.Features: All the cameras should be plug in power during working.
ProductInfo.Name: Pinecom LYD W801J4 4 Wireless Day/Night Camera + R530A Receiver Set
